item.title: Chuck Norris
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Haha, Chuck Norris is epic <3. Here are a few more I know:

Chuck Norris has a nightlight on when he goes to bed because the night is afraid of Chuck Norris.
When Chuck Norris is doing push-ups, he pushes the earth down.
Jesus walked on water, but Chuck Norris swims through land.

item.title: Chuck Norris
item.dc:creator: @Matty_m Matty`m
item.description:
@Matty_m wrote:

Chuck Norris destroyed the periodic table, because he only recognizes the element of surprise.
Chuck Norris is expected to win gold in every swimming competition at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, even though Chuck Norris does not swim. This is because when Chuck Norris enters the water, the water gets out of his way and Chuck Norris simply walks across the pool floor.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Chuck Norris
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

there used to be a better site than that but i cant remember link.
Chuck Norris isnt hung like a horse, horses are hung like chuck norris
When Chuck Norris jumps into the water he doesnt get wet the water gets chuck norris
Chuck Norris does not wear a condom. Because there is no such thing as protection from Chuck Norris.
Fact: Chuck Norris doesn’t consider it sex if the woman survives.
Chuck Norris played Russian Roulette with a fully loaded gun and won.
When the boogeyman goes to sleep, he checks his closet for Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris is the reason why Wally is hiding.
Chuck Norris’ tears cure cancer. Too bad he has never cried. Ever.
When Chuck Norris was born, the only person who cried was the doctor. Never slap Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris has counted to infinity. Twice.
In a fight between Batman and Darth Vader, the winner would be Chuck Norris.
Ironically, Chuck Norris’ hidden talent is invisibility.
The Bible was originally titled “Chuck Norris and Friends”
He who lives by the sword, dies by the sword. He who lives by Chuck Norris, dies by the roundhouse kick.
i think you get the idea now

Read full topic
